name: Dot. (pedrotuks)
description:
Hey!

Quick warning:
This game is NOT recomended to be played in fullscreen!

Welcome to "Dot.", my first game published on Itch.io!
"Dot is a clicking game, really boring to be honest. My first game that I used variables"
-pedrotuks

More games by me (probably going to get posted here soon)
https://scratch.mit.edu/studios/31902818/

KEYBINDINGS
[Q]: Reset Clicks
[E]: Reset Ball (Dot)

turbowarp.org, specifically packager.turbowarp.org for exporting the game to an .exe file!
